snippet.title: Scorch (Teaser)
snippet.description:
You can play Scorch for free on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/875740/Scorch/

Irresponsible police detective Gary Price has one last chance to prove his worth by solving the mysterious case of a man murdered in the woods. Discover the link to the past in this narrative exploration game.

Credits:
Leon Arndt - Project Lead, Programming, Music
Lea Bormann - Environment and Lighting
Huang Chen - Audio Director, Production Manager, Generalist
Lauritz Vogelsang - 2D Art and Animation
